archimate:Resource.name: Process Controller
archimate:Resource.documentation: The ABB acts as a controller that supports all the interactions between the invocation of a business process and the building blocks supporting that invocation. It is the core of a process container and responsible for executing the process activities.

properties.value: The ABB acts as a controller that supports all the interactions between the invocation of a business process and the building blocks supporting that invocation. It is the core of a process container and responsible for executing the process activities.
